Package com.example.cmput301w24t33.users

Class UserViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.cmput301w24t33.users.UserViewModel
public class UserViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for managing UI-related data in a lifecycle-conscious way. It holds user data and communicates with the UserRepository for data operations.
